title: DEMEANOR Stretch Mens Dress Shirts Long Sleeve Slim Fit Dress Shirts for Men Button Down Dress Shirts Wrinkle Free
description: 4 WAY STRETCHY DRESS SHIRTS: The DEMEANOR mens dress shirts long sleeve made from a soft and comfortable cotton/spandex blend fabric which gives the garment wrinkle-free properties and extraordinary elasticity in all directions

WRINKLE FREE & WICKING: Designed to wick moisture away from the body to help you feel cool and dry. Real Non-Iron fabric, resists wrinkles to keep you looking crisp all day; easy care, no ironing necessary, to help you always be a gentleman

MENS SLIM FIT DRESS SHIRT: Modern fit with a tapered cut, a slimmer cut at the chest and waist, shoulders for a for a sleek look that flatters most body shapes. This mens button down shirt fit is similar to a fitted or muscle fit

MEN'S DRESS SHIRTS FEATURES: The long sleeve shirts with Spread Collar,Long Sleeve,Adjustable Cuff, Hidden-button Placket, It has no front pocket, and coordinates nicely with virtually any jacket, trousers, suit, tie, offering endless possibilities

MENS SHIRTS ESSENTIALS: This button up dress shirt is suitable for various occasions that need you to look best be it at formal or semi-formal time, business meetings, for a regular work day, daily casual, office, vacation, date, party, wedding, stage
